settings.title: Can I purchase all brands present on your B2B store?
settings.content: You can only purchase the brand(s) you have been approved for, however if you are looking to become a stockist of another brand please contact your relevant account manager.

settings.title: Do I have to agree to any Terms of Trade?
settings.content:
Upon checkout, you will be asked to agree to our Terms of Trade. These can be found at the footer of the B2B.

Please be aware that if the Terms of Trade are broken, your access to our B2B store may be revoked.

settings.title: Do you have a minimum order?
settings.content: There isn't a minimum order, however orders under £300.00 will incur a £10.00 delivery charge. Orders over £300.00, which is our advisory minimum order, will include free delivery.

settings.title: Do I have to pay import tax?
settings.content: No, the prices you see on our B2B store are the prices you pay, plus VAT. Import taxes have already been paid (excluding Republic of Ireland).

settings.title: How long does delivery take?
settings.content:
The products listed on the B2B website are dispatched from our UK warehouses. We aim to despatch all in-stock items within 1-3 business days. Please be aware that during peak trading, this may differ.

Please check all despatch notifications and tracking information in the first instance. For any additional info please contact customer service or your account manager.

Please note that our operational hours are Monday to Friday 9.30am-4.30pm.

settings.title: Where can I access product catalogues, images, product specifications and RRPs?
settings.content: Product specifications can be found within each individual product screen on the B2B. You can also access this information in bulk by clicking on the required brand via 'Shop by Brand' menu.

settings.title: Who do I contact regarding queries?
settings.content:
• For all queries relating to orders and deliveries, please contact customerservice@hausdistribution.com
  • For queries regarding your account, please contact your relevant account manager or email operations@hausdistribution.com
  • For queries relating to imagery, press and marketing, please contact marketing@hausdistribution.com

settings.title: How can I find out if a particular product is coming back into stock?
settings.content:
Each out of stock product for which we have an expected replen date will have the estimated re-stock date listed within the product description.

Please note that these dates are subject to change at any time due to the logistics related to importing goods.

settings.title: Can I pre-order an item?
settings.content:
Any pre-orderable item will clearly be listed as available to pre-order. They will include an estimated delivery/dispatch date.

Please not that any estimated dates are subject to change at any time.

settings.title: Can I list items for pre-order/pre-sale in my business?
settings.content:
We strongly advise our retailers against listing products before they are received into our own UK warehouse.

Whilst we work very closely with our partners to ensure accurate and timely imports, dates are always subject to change and delays.

We cannot be held responsible for any issues relating to the above if you choose to go against our recommendations.

settings.support_hours: Our customer support is available Monday to Friday: 9am-5pm.
